thread.title: Positive outlook for Chinese buyers as Art Basel opens its doors in Hong Kong

title: Positive outlook for Chinese buyers as Art Basel opens its doors in Hong Kong
text:
Positive outlook for Chinese buyers as Art Basel opens its doors in Hong Kong 3:35pm BST - 01:39 
The art fair features galleries from 32 countries and territories and coincides with Hong Kong's 'Art Month'. Saskia O'Donoghue reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
